2DMapOutput.hint: Output file from FM2D model (.net file)

CrossSectionLocationFile.hint: .csv or .txt file (, as delimiter) that contains four columns: X_coordinate,Y_coordinate,BranchName,Length,Chainage.

RegionPolygonFile.hint: User defined polygons in json format

SectionPolygonFile.hint: User defined polygons in json format

CaseName.hint: Subdirectory name under OutputDir (no space); if not specified, 'CaseXX' (01, 02..) are used

MaximumPointsInProfile.hint: Number of points which are used to generate cross-sections

ConveyanceDetectionMethod.hint: [0] method based on mean flow velocity, [1] method based on maximum flow velocity (default)

AbsoluteVelocityThreshold.hint: Absolute velocity threshold in m/s. Used to determine storage

RelativeVelocityThreshold.hint: Relative velocity threshold (percentage). Used to determine storage

BedlevelCriterium.hint: Ignore the lowest percentage of bed level points

LakeTimesteps.hint: Number of timesteps that are used for identifying lakes

ExtrapolateStorage.hint: Add storage to water level independent cross-section section

SDFloodplainBase.hint: minimum distance between floodplain base level and crest level in meters

SDTransitionHeight.hint: Transition height at the summer dike (m)

SDOptimisationMethod.hint: [0] Optimise on Total volume, [1] optimise  on flow volume, [2] optimise on both

SkipMaps.hint: number of timesteps to skip at begin of 2D output. Use to skip problems related to initial conditions.

MinimumTotalWidth.hint: Minimum width in meters. Zero width may lead to numerical instability in 1D solvers

DefaultSection.hint: Default section name to use in cells not covered by a section polygon. Value options: floodplain1, floodplain2 or main

DefaultRegion.hint: Default region name to use in cells not covered by a region polygon.

ExportCSSData.hint: If True, exports pickled (1) input data for cross-section object, (2) flow mask for conveyance/storage.

ExportMapFiles.hint: Export detailed map output. Only use for small models or limited number of cross-sections b/c output can be huge.

CssSelection.hint: provide comma separated list of ints; e.g. 38, 39, 40. Leave empty to generate all cross-sections

OutputDirectory.hint: Output files are saved in OutputDir/CaseName; if not specified, subdirectory is created in the current directory
